The provided code chunk is part of a class that manages an animation graph editor interface. The chunk specifically handles adjustments to keyframe tangents and slopes in response to user interactions or state changes within the graph editor. It normalizes tangent values based on zoom level adjustments, recalculates handler values for in/out tangents, and updates the display by refreshing the graph data. This functionality is triggered when certain properties change (e.g., `_OneTangent` state) or during keyframe manipulation, ensuring that the graph reflects the most current state of animation curves.
